entry.title: BNV Takes Paris Fashion Week Into the Metaverse With K-Pop Group Lightsum
entry.summary: A new collaboration between BNV, Weinsanto, and Lightsum marked another step into Web3 for the high-end fashion world.

entry.title: CFTC Chair Says Crypto Regulations Could Double Bitcoin Price
entry.summary: Behnam argued that Bitcoin could soar in a regulated market where institutional investors feel more comfortable wading into the industry.

entry.title: SEC Charges Crypto Firm Hydrogen Technology With Market Manipulation, Selling Unregistered Securities
entry.summary: The SEC alleges that Hydrogen has been involved in unregistered offers and sales of securities in the form of its Hydro token.

entry.title: Ethereum Merge Shows Crypto Is 'Getting Its Act Together': Eric Schmidt
entry.summary: Schmidt also said that if Chainlink can scale, it will be “a major contribution” to the tech industry.

entry.title: Someone Just Paid $4.5M for a CryptoPunks Ethereum NFT Despite Bear Market
entry.summary: It’s the fourth-highest CryptoPunks sale when measured in ETH, and a surprising pickup in a time of declining NFT sales.

entry.title: Meghan Heintz of Dune Analytics: Crypto Bear Market Makes the Scammers Move On
entry.summary: Meghan Heintz, data scientist at Dune Analytics, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how Dune works, how its user-created data dashboards have a social element, the surprising benefit of the crypto bear market, and what she says to crypto skeptics.

entry.title: Stablecoin Markets Shift as Binance Begins USDC Conversions
entry.summary: Binance will no longer support competing stablecoins, including USDC, on its exchange. USDC’s market cap is down 5% since the announcement.

entry.title: Circle Expands USDC Stablecoin Support to Five New Blockchains
entry.summary: The company also announced a Cross-Chain Transfer Protocol to streamline the movement of USDC across networks.

entry.title: Google Web3 Lead Says Google Cloud Is a 'Layer Zero' for Crypto
entry.summary: Richard Widmann, the head of strategy, Cloud, and Web3 at Google, told Decrypt he believes in a decentralized, multichain future.

entry.title: Brazil’s Securities Regulator Targets Mercado Bitcoin Over Token Sale
entry.summary: Latin America’s biggest crypto exchange needs to give the Brazilian Securities and Exchange Commission information on tokens it issued.

entry.title: Gnosis Safe Launches SafeDAO, Safe Token
entry.summary: The Ethereum-based digital asset management platform airdropped 50 million tokens in a bid to decentralize the community.

entry.title: Art Blocks Fidenza Creator Sells $17M of Ethereum NFTs Amid Market Slump
entry.summary: Tyler Hobbs, one of the best-known generative art creators, dropped his latest NFT project to eager collectors today.

entry.title: Scaling Ethereum? Arbitrum Co-Founder Says Projects Should Consider 3 'Critical' Points
entry.summary: As competition grows to make Ethereum faster and more scalable, Offchain Labs CEO Stephen Goldfeder offers a bit of advice.

entry.title: Coinbase Cloud, Chainlink Launch Price Oracles for NFT Floor Pricing
entry.summary: Coinbase Cloud and Chainlink Labs teamed up to launch pricing feeds for the floor price of blue-chip NFTs, opening new use cases for jpegs.

entry.title: Do Kwon, Luna Foundation Guard Deny Link to $62M in Bitcoin Sought by Authorities
entry.summary: Authorities in South Korea are reportedly seeking to freeze over $60 million in Bitcoin with ties to Do Kwon and the collapsed Terra project.

entry.title: Web3 Gets Its Signature Awards Ceremony: Decrypt Studios Launches The Crypties
entry.summary: The Crypties will honor Web3’s brightest and boldest innovators this November during Art Basel Miami.

entry.title: Chainlink Announces Staking Plans, Aiming to Be AWS of Web3
entry.summary: At SmartCon 2022, Chainlink Co-founder Sergey Nazarov unveils plans to launch staking in December, plus a new economic model for the Web3 services platform.

entry.title: What You Can Do With Your Old Ethereum Mining Rigs
entry.summary: In the wake of the merge, miserable former Ethereum miners are putting their dusty GPUs to new uses—like heating their homes.

entry.title: FTX, Jump Crypto Lead $20M Funding in Solana Development Framework Coral
entry.summary: The creators of the Anchor development framework for Solana are launching Backpack, a “first-of-its-kind” wallet supporting executable NFTs.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Plummet 8%, Erasing Tuesday's Bullish Gains
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum plummeted amid continued market volatility, bringing the industry back below $1 trillion.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried May Scoop Up Bankrupt Celsius' Assets: Report
entry.summary: FTX founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried is reportedly eyeing a bid for the assets of the embattled crypto lending firm Celsius.

entry.title: DeFi Derivatives Protocol Ribbon Finance Launches Options Exchange on Ethereum
entry.summary: Ribbon Finance’s exchange lets users trade Ethereum options on-chain. The launch is the latest in a suite of structured financial products.

entry.title: Polygon Co-Founder Talks Imminent Launch of zkEVM at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Polygon co-founder Mihailo Bjelics tells Decrypt's Liam Kelly and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about why Polygon zkEVM will be the future of Ethereum scaling, how Polygon is "an un-opinionated platform" and how the Ethereum merge affected Polygon.

entry.title: How Web3 Music Platform Audius Hit 7.5 Million Monthly Users
entry.summary: Audius CEO and EDM fan Roneil Rumburg says he isn’t fazed by the bear market.

entry.title: Someone Borrowed $1.3M in Ethereum Using Mutant Ape NFTs as Collateral
entry.summary: The NFT loan business has so far survived the bear market, as collectors find new ways to capitalize on their JPEGs.

entry.title: OpenSea NFT Marketplace Adds Support for Optimism
entry.summary: Optimism is now the sixth blockchain supported by the leading NFT marketplace.

entry.title: Christie’s Goes Fully On-Chain With New Ethereum NFT Marketplace
entry.summary: The 256-year-old institution has launched Christie’s 3.0, a new platform anchored by an exclusive collection from Diana Sinclair.

entry.title: Bitcoin Payments Company Strike Raises $80 Million in Series B Round
entry.summary: The payments company plans to use the cash to grow with the “largest merchants.”

entry.title: Framework Ventures Co-Founder: Gaming Is Going to Bring 100 Million New People Into Web3
entry.summary: Framework Ventures co-founder Michael Anderson told Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Jason Nelson in our Decrypting Mainnet booth at Messari Mainnet 2022 why Framework is so bullish on blockchain gaming, NFTs in games, and how that's positioned to be the category that brings crypto to mainstream consumers.

entry.title: Proof of Stake Risks Concentrating Power to Crypto Exchanges, Wallets: IMF
entry.summary: The IMF highlighted how a proof-of-stake (PoS) consensus mechanism could lead to an “excessive concentration of decision-making powers.”

entry.title: Powell, Lagarde Urge More Regulation for DeFi and Stablecoins
entry.summary: Regulation of the decentralized finance (DeFi) sector has once again came under the spotlight of top central bankers.

entry.title: FTX US President Brett Harrison Stepping Down, Shifting to Advisory Role
entry.summary: FTX's US head is stepping away from the role, with plans to continue with the company in an advisory position instead.

entry.title: Microsoft Leads $20M Strategic Round in Web3 Data Warehouse Space and Time
entry.summary: Space and Time aims to be the leading decentralized solution for fast and secure data processing for enterprise businesses.

entry.title: CEO of Bankrupt Crypto Lender Celsius Alex Mashinsky Resigns
entry.summary: Celsius CEO Alex Mashinsky resigned today, adding that he regrets that his role at the bankrupt crypto lender became "an increasing distraction."

entry.title: Robinhood Taps Polygon Over Ethereum for Its Web3 Wallet Beta Launch
entry.summary: The trading app tapped Polygon for its “scalability, speed, low network fees, and robust developer ecosystem,” a Robinhood representative said.

entry.title: Nexo Buys Stake in Federally Chartered US Bank Summit National
entry.summary: The crypto lender is taking an ownership stake in Wyoming-based Summit National Bank despite facing current enforcement action from eight states.

entry.title: Institutional DeFi Platform dAMM Raises $2M in Private Token Sale Round
entry.summary: Participants in the round include Prismatic, WOO Network, LedgerPrime, Fischer8, Concave, Berachain and System 9, Inc.

entry.title: Decentralized Exchange Krypton Raises $7M From Framework Ventures, Samsung Next
entry.summary: The San Francisco-based firm continues its two-year plan to invest in decentralized applications.

entry.title: SEC Fines Tether’s Former Auditor $1.5M for ‘Improper Professional Conduct’
entry.summary: The regulator said New York-based accounting firm Friedman LLP, Tether’s auditor in 2017, failed to perform audits appropriately.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange FTX Wins Bid to Buy Out Bankrupt Voyager for $1.4B
entry.summary: FTX scooped up Voyager Digital’s remaining assets for a whopping $1.4 billion during the crypto broker’s bankruptcy auction.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Jump 6% as Crypto Market Reclaims $1 Trillion Mark
entry.summary: Major cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin and Ethereum, have enjoyed a hefty run-up over the past 24 hours.

entry.title: DeFi Protocol Phuture Launches Earn Product for Stablecoin USDC
entry.summary: Thanks to a tie-up with fixed-rate lender Notional, Phuture now offers investors up to a 3.25% yield on their USDC holdings.

entry.title: Crypto Advocates Cheer California Governor’s Veto of Regulatory Bill
entry.summary: Gavin Newsom says California isn't ready for statewide crypto regulation.

entry.title: Jonas Surmann of DeFi Chain at Mainnet 2022: How DeFi Will Weather Crypto Winter
entry.summary: Jonas Surmann, ambassador for DeFi Chain, sponsor of the Decrypting Mainnet booth at Messari Mainnet 2022, tells Decrypt’s Dan Roberts and Sander Lutz about why DeFi will weather the crypto winter, how DeFi Chain is building decentralized apps on top of the Bitcoin blockchain, and what could happen with regulation if the SEC views most DeFi tokens as securities.

entry.title: Microsoft's Blockchain Lead: 'Developers Keep Building in a Bear Market, They Don't Stop'
entry.summary: Microsoft's blockchain lead Yorke Rhodes tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Microsoft approaches Web3 and how it began its blockchain tooling with Ethereum but is now looking into working on other chains. "We think about it from a portfolio perspective, you're not focused on pushing one thing, you're focused on pushing a whole portfolio... we don't like to be kingmakers."

entry.title: Google Cloud's Web3 Lead at Mainnet 2022: The Problem With Crypto 'Purity Tests'
entry.summary: Rich Widmann, the Web3 lead at Google Cloud, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 how Google Cloud is trying to "build a giant bridge" between Web2 and Web3, and the problem with crypto "purity tests."

entry.title: Maple Finance CEO and Co-Founder on Facilitating $300M in Loans to Bitcoin Miners
entry.summary: Sidney Powell, the CEO and Co-Founder of Maple Finance, joins Decrypt to discuss its unique role in the lending space, why Bitcoin miners are willing to pay up to 20% for a loan, and how it's building the tooling to let any business spin up a crypto credit facility.

entry.title: Steve Newcomb of zkSync: 2023 Will Be 'Zero-Knowledge Season'
entry.summary: Steve Newcomb, chief product officer of zkSync, tells Decrypt's Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about why "zero knowledge" and EVM-compatibility matters so much for DeFi scaling solutions now. He also predicts the biggest crypto news of 2023 will be "the great port" to zk-proofs.

entry.title: Euler Labs COO: DeFi Lending 'Duopoly' of Compound and Aave Invites Competition
entry.summary: Brandon Neal, COO of Euler Labs, told Decrypt's Liam Kelly and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet booth at Messari Mainnet 2022 about how Euler approached the Ethereum merge, how to onboard more people into crypto and DeFi, and how Euler competes with Compound and Aave, the leaders in the DeFi borrowing and lending space.

entry.title: Miller Whitehouse-Levine of DeFi Education Fund Shares Reasons for Optimism on Crypto Regulation
entry.summary: DeFi Education Fund policy director Miller Whitehouse-Levine tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how DeFi in some ways "came too early for the crypto ecosystem" and that some lawmakers see it as "hocus pocus, but there's still reason for optimism. He also sees Bitcoin as "a DeFi protocol for payments."

entry.title: Steven Goldfeder of Offchain Labs Talks Arbitrum Bug and Layer-2 Competition
entry.summary: Steven Goldfeder, co-founder and CEO of Arbitrum developer Offchain Labs, tells Decrypt's Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 how Arbitrum is handling its recent bug, how he thinks about competitors to Arbitrum, and how to convince DeFi users that bridging funds is safe even when there are so many hacks and security failures in the DeFi space. He also teases the "full vision" for Arbitrum since it's still in beta.

entry.title: Meet 'Funky Crypto Finance Lab' UMA Protocol
entry.summary: Hart Lambur, founder of DeFi project UMA Protocol, talks to Decrypt's Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 all about what UMA does and what they have in store for the next iteration of their oracle, and how to write decentralized financial contracts.

entry.title: 'Blockchain Revolution' Author Alex Tapscott at Mainnet 2022: Big Companies Are Warming to Public Blockchains
entry.summary: Alex Tapscott, co-author of the 2018 crypto book "Blockchain Revolution," talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how big companies that in the past thought crypto wasn't "ready for primetime" are now more willing to invest in public blockchains. At the same time, he warns, "I don't want to overstate the culture shift too much."

entry.title: Ernst & Young Is 'All In on Public Blockchains': Paul Brody at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Paul Brody tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 why EY is "all in on public blockchains" and why any big companies that are still building private, closed blockchains don't get it.

entry.title: Coinbase Policy Chief Kara Calvert Talks SEC Enforcement at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Kara Calvert, Head of U.S. Policy at Coinbase, talks with Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about the proposed legislation she's tracking, how Coinbase is navigating regulation, and wanting to see a replacement for the SEC's Howey Test.

entry.title: Messari CEO Ryan Selkis Talks Bear Market, DeFi, and SEC at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Messari CEO Ryan Selkis joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts to kick off our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022. He talked SEC Chair Gary Gensler and regulatory enforcement, DeFi growth and building during a bear market, the Ethereum merge, and had a message for the folks at home.

entry.title: Solana Founder Anatoly Yakovenko Talks Saga Phone, Helium, and ETH Merge at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Solana founder Anatoly Yakovenko joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Andrew Hayward in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 and talked up Helium's move to Solana, the Solana Saga Android phone, and even gave his take on the Ethereum merge.

entry.title: Uniswap's Big Plans for Taking on Binance and Coinbase: COO Mary-Catherine Lader at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Uniswap Labs COO Mary-Catherine Lader joined Decrypt's Andrew Hayward and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 and talked about how the leading DEX is expanding into new areas and taking on big exchanges like Binance and Coinbase.

entry.title: LBRY CEO Jeremy Kauffman at Mainnet 2022: We've Been Fighting the SEC for 5 Years
entry.summary: Jeremy Kauffman, whose decentralized video sharing platform LBRY is involved in a securities lawsuit with the SEC, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Sander Lutz what will happen next, and why he's running for office in New Hampshire, in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022.

entry.title: How Web3 Music App Audius Hit 7.5 Million Users: CEO Roneil Rumburg at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Audius founder and CEO Roneil Rumburg joins Decrypt's Kate Irwin and Andrew Hayward in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to tell us what's new with the decentralized music-streaming app and who its competitors in web3 music services are.
